channel.title: CVE Feed for SUSE -- SUSE Linux Enterprise
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SUSE -- SUSE Linux Enterprise

item.title: CVE-2011-3172|2024-09-17T04:28:45.768Z -- suse -- suse%20linux%20enterprise
item.description: A vulnerability in pam_modules of SUSE Linux Enterprise allows attackers to log into accounts that should have been disabled. Affected releases are SUSE Linux Enterprise: versions prior to 12.
